WebApplication Class Reference

Represents a WebApplication for serving Froth WebApp bundles. WebApplication provides some internally implemented web methods for debug and other information. More...

#import <WebApplication.h>

Inherits NSObject.

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(id) - init

Static Public Member Functions

(NSString *) + deploymentMode
 Returns the deployment mode name for the current running application. This is determined by looking at the app bundle's parent folder name. This, by design, is the deployment mode name.
(NSString *) + deploymentUriPath
 Returns the web path to the currently running app, typically '/' for root.
(NSDictionary *) + deploymentConfigDictionary
 Returns the bundles Info.plist (or Info-Linux.plist) user info dictionary.

Detailed Description

Represents a WebApplication for serving Froth WebApp bundles. WebApplication provides some internally implemented web methods for debug and other information.



1. [host]/[froth-api]/exe/dump
Dumps the enviorment variables out for the user.
